Title: Atlas Of Human Anatomy
Author: ফ্রাঙ্ক এইচ. নিটার
Summary:
Atlas of Human Anatomy
Atlas of Human Anatomy uses Frank H. Netter, MD's detailed illustrations to demystify this often intimidating subject, providing a coherent, lasting visual vocabulary for understanding anatomy and how it applies to medicine. This 5th Edition features a stronger clinical focus-with new diagnostic imaging examples-making it easier to correlate anatomy with practice. Student Consult online access includes supplementary learning resources, from additional illustrations to an anatomy dissection guide and more. Netter. It's how you know.

Title: Atlas of Cardiac Imaging
Author: ইউজিন ব্র্যানওয়াল্ড
Summary:
Atlas of Cardiac Imaging
(Current Medicine, Inc.) Brigham and Women's Hospital, Boston, MA. Atlas of high-quality, halftone and color cardiac imaging. For the student, resident, and practitioner. DNLM: Heart Diseases-- diagnosis--atlases.

Title: Orthopaedic sports medicine: Principles and practice (2-Vol Set)
Author: ডেলি
Book_Title: Orthopaedic sports medicine: Principles and practice (2-Vol Set)

Title: Gellis and Kagan's Current Pediatric Therapy
Author: জুলি আর. ইঙ্গেলফিঙ্গার
Book_Title: Gellis and Kagan's Current Pediatric Therapy
Book_Author: Julie R. Ingelfinger,Richard A. Polin,Fredric D. Burg,Ellen R. Wald

Author: ফ্রাঙ্ক এইচ. নিটার

Title: Atlas of Human Anatomy Package [With Gray's Anatomy for Students]
Author: ফ্রাঙ্ক এইচ. নিটার
Book_Title: Atlas of Human Anatomy Package [With Gray's Anatomy for Students]

Title: Marcus Cardiac Imaging : A Companion to Braunwald's Heart Disease
Author: ব্রুস এইচ. ব্রান্ডেজ
Summary:
Marcus Cardiac Imaging: A Companion to Braunwald's Heart Disease (2-Volume Set)
University of Iowa, Iowa City. Second edition of a text on new imaging techniques in cardiovascular diseases, for radiologists. Previous edition 1991. Title renamed in honor of the late Dr. M.L. Marcus. Halftone images and color plates. 116 contributors, 107 U.S. DNLM: Diagnostic Imaging.
Book_Title: Marcus Cardiac Imaging : A Companion to Braunwald's Heart Disease

Title: Primary Cardiology
Author: ইউজিন ব্র্যানওয়াল্ড
Summary:
Primary Cardiology
This authoritative, practical, and user-friendly presentation helps the non-specialist meet the health care system's evolving need for the management of heart disease by primary care providers. Useful diagrams, flow charts, and algorithms guide the diagnosis, treatment of presenting complaints, and established conditions typical to primary care. This new edition has been completely updated, with special attention paid to the inclusion of evidence-based summaries.

Title: Textbook of Interventional Cardiology (2- Vol Set)
Author: ইরিক জে. টপল
Summary:
Cardiology: An Illustrated Textbook (Set of 2 Volumes)
Table of Contents
Volume 1
Section 1 Basic Cardiology
Section 2 Cardiovascular Pharmacology
Section 3 Diagnosis
Section 4 Electro physiology
Section 5 Coronary Heart Diseases

Volume 2
Section 6 Valvular Heart Diseases
Section 7 Vascular Diseases
Section 8 Heart Failure
Section 9 Myocardial And Pericardial Diseases
Section 10 Pulmonary Vascular Disease And Adult Congenital Heart Disease
Section 11 Secondary Disorders Of The Heart
Section 12 Relevant Issues In Clinical Cardiology
Section 13 Preventive Strategies For Coronary Artery Diseases
Section 14 Preventive Strategies For Other Cardiovascular Diseases
Section 15 Evolving Concepts
Book_Title: Textbook of Interventional Cardiology (2- Vol Set)

Title: Endocrinology (3-Volume Set)
Author: লেসলি জে. ডেগ্রুট
Summary:
Endocrinology: 3-Volume Set
Revised throughout, the 5th Edition of this leading reference presents a complete and up-to-date review and analysis of all aspects of endocrinology, diabetes, and bone metabolism. Readers will also find state-of-the-art information on genetics, proteinomics, and hormone signaling, and coverage of the field's hottest topics in nearly 20 new chapters. Joined by an international team of leading expertsmany new to this editionDrs. Jameson and DeGroot provide guidance that integrates the basic science of endocrinology with clinical medicine and the practical management of endocrine disorders. A clinical focus emphasizes diagnosis and therapy.

Title: Physician Assistant: A Guide to Clinical Practice
Author: রুথ বলওয়েগ
Summary:
Physician Assistant: A Guide to Clinical Practice
Heres the only book dedicated to giving you the complete information that you need to become an effective Physician Assistant and maintain those high standards in practice. This up-to-date edition covers all aspects of the physician assistant profession, the PA curriculum, and the PA's role in practice, all in an easy-to-use textbook format that features convenient tables and clear illustrations, as well as case studies and clinical application questions. Youll find this book invaluable throughout your course of study, when entering the job market, and as an excellent reference in clinical practice. And, with this Expert Consult title, youll be able to search the entire contents of the book, online, from anywhere.
Book_Title: Physician Assistant: A Guide to Clinical Practice

Title: Comprehensive Respiratory Care
Author: ডেভিড আর. জেন্টজার
Summary:
Comprehensive Respiratory Care
Long Island Jewish Medical Center, New Hyde Park, New York. Comprehensive reference on the basic science and clinical aspects of respiratory function and disorders, for practitioners and residents. Includes organizational topics such as change, managing quality, ethics, and legal aspects. 75 contributors, 74 U.S.

Title: Infectious Diseases
Author: শেরউড এল. গোরব্যাচ
Summary:
New and Emerging Infectious Diseases
As expanding human communities result in radical modifications to our natural environments, previously harmless micro-organisms take on lethal potential. Moreover, existing diseases continually threaten to re-emerge or spread. This issue of Medical Clinics of North America looks at important aspects of this troubling topic and features the following articles: the Role of Migrants and Immigrants in Infectious Disease; Global Environment Change and Infectious Disease; the Role of the Traveller; Cholera; Rickettsial and Other Emerging Tick-borne Infections; West Nile Virus; Surveillance of Microbial Threats; HIV/AIDS; Chikungunya Virus Infections; Rift Valley Fever; Medical Tourism; Changing Patterns of Dengue and the Role of Travellers; and Antimicrobial Resistance.

Title: Atlas of Infectious Diseases Volume 10: Cardiovascular Infections
Author: জিরাল্ড এল. মান্ডেল এমডি এমএসিপি
Summary:
Cardiovascular Infections (Atlas of Infectious Diseases, V. 10) (Vol 10)
Volume ten of a full-color, ten volume atlas: an extensive collection of illustrations covering the entire field of infectious diseases. Each volume has over 500 spectacular colour illustrations. Figures include clinical photographs of patients, pathology specimens, gram stains, culture plates, radiographic material, scans, schematic drawings, and tables. Available in book, CD-ROM, and slide format!
Book_Title: Atlas of Infectious Diseases Volume 10: Cardiovascular Infections
Book_Author: Gerald L. Mandell MD MACP,Oksana M. Korzeniowski

Title: Current Diagnosis
Author: রেক্স বি. কন এমডি
Summary:
Current Diagnosis
Intended for general practitioners and hospital doctors, this book covers all aspects of medical diagnosis. Topics discussed include presenting signs and symptoms, course of the disease process, common complications and how to identify them, expected and unusual findings on physical examination, useful laboratory procedures, diagnostic and therapeutic tests, and tips on avoiding errors and pitfalls in diagnosis. The author covers rare diseases as well as those commonly seen.
Book_Author: Rex B. Conn MD,William Z. Borer MD

Title: Saunders Infection Control Reference Service
Author: ইলিয়াস অ্যাব্রুটিন
Summary:
Saunders Infection Control Reference Service
B. Saunders. Allegheny Univ. of the Health Sciences, Philadelphia, PA. Compilation of the most authoritative, most used guidelines of infection control practice. Experts were asked to present a 'guide to the guidelines' where multiple possibilities existed. Foreign guidelines are used where as appropriate. 83 U.S. contributors.

Title: Tumors Of The Fetus And Newborn
Author: হার্ট ইসাকস
Summary: B. Saunders. Univ. of California, San Diego. Text on the clinical and pathologic features of neoplastic disease and tumor-like conditions in the fetus and newborn. DNLM: Neoplasms--in infancy
Book_Title: Tumors Of The Fetus And Newborn

Title: Textbook Of Surgery - The Biological Basis Of Modern Surgical Practice
Author: এইচ. কিম লিয়ার্লি
Summary: Duke University, Durham, NC. Fifteenth edition of a Brandon/Hill Medical List selection. Major textbook/reference for students and practitioners. Features six new chapters, including 'Molecular Biology in Surgery' and 'Laparoscopic Surgery.' 239 contributors, 236 U.S. DNLM: Surgery.
Book_Title: Textbook Of Surgery - The Biological Basis Of Modern Surgical Practice

Title: Breast Disease
Author: ডগলাস জে. মার্চেন্ট
Summary: B. Saunders. Tufts Univ., Boston, MA. Primer on the diagnosis and treatment of breast diseases and the role of the primary care physician in treating these patients. Illustrated. 22 U.S. contributors. DNLM: Breast Diseases.

Title: Endoscopic Surgery
Author: জেফ্রিই পোস্কি
Summary: University of South Carolina, Columbia. Textbook for surgical residents on standard and new techniques in flexible endoscopic surgery. Color and halftone illustrations. 63 contributors, 54 U.S. DNLM: Endoscopy - methods.

Title: Clinical Nutrition - Enteral And Tube Feeding
Author: জন এল. রোমবিউ
Summary: University of Pennsylvania, Philadelphia. Third edition of a text on the scientific background and clinical techniques of enteral nutrition, for clinicians in nutrition and gastroenterology. Previous edition 1990. 78 contributors, 68 U.S. DNLM: Enteral Nutrition.
Book_Title: Clinical Nutrition - Enteral And Tube Feeding

Title: Ambulatory Surgery
Author: ব্রুস ডেভিড স্কিরমার
Summary: Univ. of Virginia, Charlottesville. Text providing practicing general surgeons and allied health professionals with a comprehensive reference to the ever-expanding practice of out-patient surgery. Includes economics, administration, anesthesia, and procedures and techniques. 63 contributors, 61 U.S. DNLM: Ambulatory Surgery.

Title: Surgery For Cancer Of The Larynx And Related Structures
Author: কার্ল ই. সিলভার
Summary: Here is the 2nd Edition of this classic text in the field of laryngeal cancer surgery. This text combines an atlas of surgical procedures with detailed discussions of the development, indications, complications, and results of the procedures. Includes chapters on unusual tumors of the larynx, management of tracheal stomal recurrence, management of tracheal stomal stenosis and voice restoration, near total laryngectomy, subtotal laryngectomy, and reconstruction of large surgical defects after resections for tumors of the hypopharynx and cervical esophagus.
Book_Title: Surgery For Cancer Of The Larynx And Related Structures

Title: The Netter Collection Of Medical Illustrations : Part I Upper Limb: Volume 6
Author: রিচার্ড পার্কার
Summary: Provides a visual guide to the upper extremity, from basic science and anatomy to orthopaedics and rheumatology. This title covers many advances in musculoskeletal medicine and imaging - offering insights into the anatomy, physiology, and clinical conditions of the shoulder, upper arm and elbow, forearm and wrist, and hand and finger.
Book_Title: The Netter Collection Of Medical Illustrations : Part I Upper Limb: Volume 6

Title: Grays Clinical Photographic Dissector Of The Human Body With Student Consult Online Access
Author: ম্যারিওস লুকাস
Summary: Helps you take a clinical approach to the study of anatomy. This guide uses full-color photographs to orient you quickly in the lab, and points out the clinical significance of each structure and every dissection you make. It also provides information on several emergency procedures used to further reinforce the clinical correlations.
Book_Title: Grays Clinical Photographic Dissector Of The Human Body With Student Consult Online Access

Title: Atlas of Clinical Gross Anatomy Online Access
Author: কেনেথ পি. মোসেস
Summary: Covers surface and radiological anatomy and cutaneous and muscular innervations as well as gross anatomy. This title provides students with a resource for use before, during and after lab work, in preparation for examinations, and later on as a primer for clinical work.
Book_Title: Atlas of Clinical Gross Anatomy Online Access
Book_Author: Kenneth P. Moses,Pedro B. Nava,John C. Banks,Darrell K. Petersen

Title: The Human Brain in Photographs and Diagrams: With Student Consult Online Access
Author: জন নল্টি
Book_Title: The Human Brain in Photographs and Diagrams: With Student Consult Online Access

Title: Saunders Manual of Pediatric Practice
Author: লরেন্স ফিনর্বাগ
Summary: State Univ. of New York at Brooklyn. Comprehensive manual designed to assist clinicians caring for children in making accurate assessment of their patients and providing appropriate therapy. Outline format with highlighted key information. 202 contributors, 195 U.S. Reinforced softcover. DNLM: Pediatrics.

Title: Prevention Practice  (Cloth Bound)
Author: রুথ লেভিন
Summary: College of Staten Island of the City University of New York, Staten Island, New York. Injury prevention and preventive care for physical therapy and occupational therapy students and practitioners. 43 Contributors. DNLM: Health Promotion.

Title: Low Back Pain Medical Diagnosis and Comprehensive Management
Author: স্কট ডি. বোডেন
Summary: The George Washington University Medical Center, Washington, D.C. Practical text for physicians on the evaluation and treatment of over 70 disorders associated with low back pain. Previous edition 1989. DNLM: Low Back Pain diagnosis.
Book_Title: Low Back Pain Medical Diagnosis and Comprehensive Management
Book_Author: Scott D. Boden,David G. Borenstein,Sam W. Wiesel

Title: Atlas of Image Guided Spinal Procedures (Hardcover)
Author: মাইকেল ব্রুস ফারম্যান
Book_Title: Atlas of Image Guided Spinal Procedures (Hardcover)

Title: Daniels and Worthingham's Muscle Testing: Techniques of Manual Examination (Paperback)
Author: হেলেন জে. হিজলপ
Summary:
Daniels and Worthingham?s Muscle Testing: Techniques of Manual Examination, 8th Edition is the original handbook of manual evaluation of muscular strength. In addition to offering traditional methods for assessing and grading skeletal muscle function, the book provides a comprehensive section on muscle anatomy and innervations that rounds out the testing chapters by linking muscle topography and function. This edition includes a new DVD of tests and procedures video clips that supplement the tests explained in the book.

Key Features

    "Helpful Hints and Substitutions" boxes provide additional tips and highlight muscle substitutions that may occur during a test to ensure greater accuracy in testing.
    Clearly identifies each muscle in the body by a constant reference number that can be found indexed in the Alphabetical List of Muscles by Region and Ready Reference Anatomy to help the reader quickly identify any muscle.
    Richly illustrated to clearly show testing sequences, muscle anatomy, and muscle innervation for more accurate practice.
Book_Title: Daniels and Worthingham's Muscle Testing: Techniques of Manual Examination (Paperback)

Title: Neurology : Neonatology Questions and Controversies: Expert Consult (Hardcover)
Author: জাফরি পার্লম্যান
Book_Title: Neurology : Neonatology Questions and Controversies: Expert Consult (Hardcover)

Title: Urology For Primary Care Physicians
Author: আনয়িমি ও. ন্সেয়ো
Summary: West Virginia Univ., Clarksburg. Presents the most cost effective and appropriate approaches for the evaluation, treatment, and triage of patients with urologic problems. For primary care physicians in the office or emergency department. Color and halftone illustrations. DNLM: Urogenital Diseases.

Title: Campbell's Urology Vol- 1, 2 and 3
Author: প্যাট্রিক সি. ওয়ালশ
Summary: An analysis of all aspects of urology from basic science through to the management of clinical disorders. Coverage includes radical prostatectomy, pre- and postnatal diagnosis in the management of congenital urinary tract abnormalities, extracorporeal shock wave lithotripsy and cloacal malformations. Contributors also discuss genetic determinants of urologic disease, renal function in the foetus and neonate, physiology of erection and pathophysiology of impotence, among other topics.

Title: Diamond and Dalessios the Practicing Physicians Approach to Headache  (Cloth Bound)
Author: মার্লি এল. ডায়মন্ড
Book_Title: Diamond and Dalessios the Practicing Physicians Approach to Headache  (Cloth Bound)

Title: Yen & Jaffe's Reproductive Endocrinology: Physiology, Pathophysiology, and Clinical Management (Hardcover)
Author: রবার্ট এল. বার্বিরি এমডি
Book_Title: Yen & Jaffe's Reproductive Endocrinology: Physiology,Pathophysiology,and Clinical Management (Hardcover)
Book_Author: Robert L. Barbieri MD,Jerome F. Strauss

Title: Renal Disease Progression and Management - Role Of Vasoactive Agents, Cytokines, Lipids and Nutrition (Hardcover)
Author: মোরেল এম আভ্রাম
Summary: This unique collection of cutting-edge contributions from internationally distinguished leaders in the field of nephrology presents current insights and notable advances in renal disease pathophysiology and potential management strategies. Features thorough updates on the role of hypertension, diabetes, vasoactive agents, cytokines, lipids, nutrition, and more. Illustrations and tables clarify and enhance important information.
Book_Title: Renal Disease Progression and Management - Role Of Vasoactive Agents,Cytokines,Lipids and Nutrition (Hardcover)

Title: Hollinshead's Functional Anatomy Of The Limbs And Back
Author: ডেভিড বি. জেনকিনস
Book_Title: Hollinshead's Functional Anatomy Of The Limbs And Back

Title: Wright's Liver and Biliary Disease: Pathophysiology, Diagnosis and Management
Author: জি. এইচ. মিলওয়ার্ড-সাডলার
Summary:
Wright's Liver and Biliary Disease: Pathophysiology, Diagnosis and Management (Vols 1-2)
This is the third edition of a reference on liver and biliary disease. It provides updated information on all aspects of hepatology. A detailed introductory section on the pathophysiology of hepatic disorders is followed by chapters on clinical diagnosis, investigation, treatment and complications. Particular emphasis is given in this edition to new information about the hepatitis viruses, hepatic carcinoma and transplantation.
Book_Title: Wright's Liver and Biliary Disease: Pathophysiology,Diagnosis and Management

Title: Infectious Disease and Antimicrobial Therapy of the Ears, Nose and Throat
Author: জোনাস টি জনসন

Title: Endoscopic Surgery
Author: জেফ্রিই পোস্কি
Summary: University of South Carolina, Columbia. Textbook for surgical residents on standard and new techniques in flexible endoscopic surgery. Color and halftone illustrations. 63 contributors, 54 U.S. DNLM: Endoscopy - methods.

Title: Clinical Nutrition - Enteral And Tube Feeding
Author: জন এল. রোমবিউ
Summary: University of Pennsylvania, Philadelphia. Third edition of a text on the scientific background and clinical techniques of enteral nutrition, for clinicians in nutrition and gastroenterology. Previous edition 1990. 78 contributors, 68 U.S. DNLM: Enteral Nutrition.
Book_Title: Clinical Nutrition - Enteral And Tube Feeding

Title: Ambulatory Surgery
Author: ব্রুস ডেভিড স্কিরমার
Summary: Univ. of Virginia, Charlottesville. Text providing practicing general surgeons and allied health professionals with a comprehensive reference to the ever-expanding practice of out-patient surgery. Includes economics, administration, anesthesia, and procedures and techniques. 63 contributors, 61 U.S. DNLM: Ambulatory Surgery.

Title: Surgery For Cancer Of The Larynx And Related Structures
Author: কার্ল ই. সিলভার
Summary: Here is the 2nd Edition of this classic text in the field of laryngeal cancer surgery. This text combines an atlas of surgical procedures with detailed discussions of the development, indications, complications, and results of the procedures. Includes chapters on unusual tumors of the larynx, management of tracheal stomal recurrence, management of tracheal stomal stenosis and voice restoration, near total laryngectomy, subtotal laryngectomy, and reconstruction of large surgical defects after resections for tumors of the hypopharynx and cervical esophagus.
Book_Title: Surgery For Cancer Of The Larynx And Related Structures

Title: The Netter Collection Of Medical Illustrations : Part I Upper Limb: Volume 6
Author: রিচার্ড পার্কার
Summary: Provides a visual guide to the upper extremity, from basic science and anatomy to orthopaedics and rheumatology. This title covers many advances in musculoskeletal medicine and imaging - offering insights into the anatomy, physiology, and clinical conditions of the shoulder, upper arm and elbow, forearm and wrist, and hand and finger.
Book_Title: The Netter Collection Of Medical Illustrations : Part I Upper Limb: Volume 6

Title: Grays Clinical Photographic Dissector Of The Human Body With Student Consult Online Access
Author: ম্যারিওস লুকাস
Summary: Helps you take a clinical approach to the study of anatomy. This guide uses full-color photographs to orient you quickly in the lab, and points out the clinical significance of each structure and every dissection you make. It also provides information on several emergency procedures used to further reinforce the clinical correlations.
Book_Title: Grays Clinical Photographic Dissector Of The Human Body With Student Consult Online Access

Title: Atlas of Clinical Gross Anatomy Online Access
Author: কেনেথ পি. মোসেস
Summary: Covers surface and radiological anatomy and cutaneous and muscular innervations as well as gross anatomy. This title provides students with a resource for use before, during and after lab work, in preparation for examinations, and later on as a primer for clinical work.
Book_Title: Atlas of Clinical Gross Anatomy Online Access
Book_Author: Kenneth P. Moses,Pedro B. Nava,John C. Banks,Darrell K. Petersen

Title: The Human Brain in Photographs and Diagrams: With Student Consult Online Access
Author: জন নল্টি
Book_Title: The Human Brain in Photographs and Diagrams: With Student Consult Online Access

Title: Saunders Manual of Pediatric Practice
Author: লরেন্স ফিনর্বাগ
Summary: State Univ. of New York at Brooklyn. Comprehensive manual designed to assist clinicians caring for children in making accurate assessment of their patients and providing appropriate therapy. Outline format with highlighted key information. 202 contributors, 195 U.S. Reinforced softcover. DNLM: Pediatrics.

Title: Prevention Practice  (Cloth Bound)
Author: রুথ লেভিন
Summary: College of Staten Island of the City University of New York, Staten Island, New York. Injury prevention and preventive care for physical therapy and occupational therapy students and practitioners. 43 Contributors. DNLM: Health Promotion.

Title: Low Back Pain Medical Diagnosis and Comprehensive Management
Author: স্কট ডি. বোডেন
Summary: The George Washington University Medical Center, Washington, D.C. Practical text for physicians on the evaluation and treatment of over 70 disorders associated with low back pain. Previous edition 1989. DNLM: Low Back Pain diagnosis.
Book_Title: Low Back Pain Medical Diagnosis and Comprehensive Management
Book_Author: Scott D. Boden,David G. Borenstein,Sam W. Wiesel

Title: Atlas of Image Guided Spinal Procedures (Hardcover)
Author: মাইকেল ব্রুস ফারম্যান
Book_Title: Atlas of Image Guided Spinal Procedures (Hardcover)

Title: Daniels and Worthingham's Muscle Testing: Techniques of Manual Examination (Paperback)
Author: হেলেন জে. হিজলপ
Summary:
Daniels and Worthingham?s Muscle Testing: Techniques of Manual Examination, 8th Edition is the original handbook of manual evaluation of muscular strength. In addition to offering traditional methods for assessing and grading skeletal muscle function, the book provides a comprehensive section on muscle anatomy and innervations that rounds out the testing chapters by linking muscle topography and function. This edition includes a new DVD of tests and procedures video clips that supplement the tests explained in the book.

Key Features

    "Helpful Hints and Substitutions" boxes provide additional tips and highlight muscle substitutions that may occur during a test to ensure greater accuracy in testing.
    Clearly identifies each muscle in the body by a constant reference number that can be found indexed in the Alphabetical List of Muscles by Region and Ready Reference Anatomy to help the reader quickly identify any muscle.
    Richly illustrated to clearly show testing sequences, muscle anatomy, and muscle innervation for more accurate practice.
Book_Title: Daniels and Worthingham's Muscle Testing: Techniques of Manual Examination (Paperback)

Title: Neurology : Neonatology Questions and Controversies: Expert Consult (Hardcover)
Author: জাফরি পার্লম্যান
Book_Title: Neurology : Neonatology Questions and Controversies: Expert Consult (Hardcover)

Title: Urology For Primary Care Physicians
Author: আনয়িমি ও. ন্সেয়ো
Summary: West Virginia Univ., Clarksburg. Presents the most cost effective and appropriate approaches for the evaluation, treatment, and triage of patients with urologic problems. For primary care physicians in the office or emergency department. Color and halftone illustrations. DNLM: Urogenital Diseases.

Title: Campbell's Urology Vol- 1, 2 and 3
Author: প্যাট্রিক সি. ওয়ালশ
Summary: An analysis of all aspects of urology from basic science through to the management of clinical disorders. Coverage includes radical prostatectomy, pre- and postnatal diagnosis in the management of congenital urinary tract abnormalities, extracorporeal shock wave lithotripsy and cloacal malformations. Contributors also discuss genetic determinants of urologic disease, renal function in the foetus and neonate, physiology of erection and pathophysiology of impotence, among other topics.

Title: Diamond and Dalessios the Practicing Physicians Approach to Headache  (Cloth Bound)
Author: মার্লি এল. ডায়মন্ড
Book_Title: Diamond and Dalessios the Practicing Physicians Approach to Headache  (Cloth Bound)

Title: Yen & Jaffe's Reproductive Endocrinology: Physiology, Pathophysiology, and Clinical Management (Hardcover)
Author: রবার্ট এল. বার্বিরি এমডি
Book_Title: Yen & Jaffe's Reproductive Endocrinology: Physiology,Pathophysiology,and Clinical Management (Hardcover)
Book_Author: Robert L. Barbieri MD,Jerome F. Strauss

Title: Renal Disease Progression and Management - Role Of Vasoactive Agents, Cytokines, Lipids and Nutrition (Hardcover)
Author: মোরেল এম আভ্রাম
Summary: This unique collection of cutting-edge contributions from internationally distinguished leaders in the field of nephrology presents current insights and notable advances in renal disease pathophysiology and potential management strategies. Features thorough updates on the role of hypertension, diabetes, vasoactive agents, cytokines, lipids, nutrition, and more. Illustrations and tables clarify and enhance important information.
Book_Title: Renal Disease Progression and Management - Role Of Vasoactive Agents,Cytokines,Lipids and Nutrition (Hardcover)

Title: Hollinshead's Functional Anatomy Of The Limbs And Back
Author: ডেভিড বি. জেনকিনস
Book_Title: Hollinshead's Functional Anatomy Of The Limbs And Back

Title: Wright's Liver and Biliary Disease: Pathophysiology, Diagnosis and Management
Author: জি. এইচ. মিলওয়ার্ড-সাডলার
Summary:
Wright's Liver and Biliary Disease: Pathophysiology, Diagnosis and Management (Vols 1-2)
This is the third edition of a reference on liver and biliary disease. It provides updated information on all aspects of hepatology. A detailed introductory section on the pathophysiology of hepatic disorders is followed by chapters on clinical diagnosis, investigation, treatment and complications. Particular emphasis is given in this edition to new information about the hepatitis viruses, hepatic carcinoma and transplantation.
Book_Title: Wright's Liver and Biliary Disease: Pathophysiology,Diagnosis and Management
